attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have anyone that has involved in illegal dog figthing banned from keeping any breed of dog forever, the resent spotlight show revealed that the GAA player who was involved in illegal dog fighting throughout europe overturned through appeal and is allowed to keep dogs

rejection.details: Please make the title of your petition a call to action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
